dublin_core.dcvalue: The Canadian PVC is designed to be a federal-facing, multi-jurisdictional program, which: ensures a common look and feel, including a Canada watermark, which adheres to the Smart Health Card standards; and is recognized and trusted by foreign states as being endorsed by Canada.

Submitted by Akshita Palliwal (palliwala@who.int) on 2022-02-25T11:40:29Z No. of bitstreams: 2 22-01-10 Pan-Canadian Vaccination Credentials specifications - Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC).docx: 2546592 bytes, checksum: 7e435fe7096e14dc39b47384e3d62f61 (MD5) 20211128_Overview of Canadian Proof of Vaccination OECD deck_webinar.pdf: 1434817 bytes, checksum: 22bfd1ecf0805d6515a49ace3d51c14a (MD5)
